responseA: There appears to be an illustration of what could be perceived as an animal, specifically a sheep, on the wine label. It is depicted in a somewhat whimsical manner, reclining in a tub and holding a glass, which is an anthropomorphic portrayal. I am very certain as I would rate my certainty at 1 that the image represents an animal, although it is done in a playful and stylized way rather than a realistic one.
